snippet: Coach John Tortorella declined to discuss the slumps of Brad Richards and Rick Nash as the Rangers, trailing by 3-2 in their series against the Capitals, prepared for Sunday’s Game 6.
abstract: New York Rangers coach John Tortorella declines to discuss slumps of stars Brad Richards and Rick Nash as Rangers, trailing 3-2 in their series against Washington Capitals, prepare for Game 6.
lead_paragraph: Coach John Tortorella declined to discuss the slumps of Brad Richards and Rick Nash as the Rangers, trailing by 3-2 in their series against the Capitals, prepared for Sunday’s Game 6.

headline.seo: For Rangers’ Brad Richards, Sagging Spirits Match His Playoff Production
headline.main: Stars Are Feeling Down With Rangers on Verge Of Being Knocked Out
headline.print_headline: Stars Are Feeling Down With Rangers on Verge Of Being Knocked Out
